page.description: Get the value of a 16-bit word from the blob.
page.original:
.PEEKW() Syntax Word_Value as N = .PEEKW( Position as N ) ArgumentDescription PositionThe position of the 16 bit word value.
Description The .PEEKW() method returns the value of an unsigned word (16 bit) value at a Position in a blob. The first position is 1. This function returns a -1 if the position is past the end. Example b1 = file.to_blob("C:\Wallpaper\claire_081003.jpg") ? b1.peekw(10) = 70
See Also Blob Functions and Methods
